00055 #define SIGN(x) (((x) > 0)?1:(((x) < 0)?-1:0))
00056 #define SQR(x) ((x)*(x))

00058 #undef MIN
00059 #undef MAX
00060 
00061 template <typename T> T MIN(T a, T b) { return a < b ? a : b; }
00062 template <typename T> T MAX(T a, T b) { return a > b ? a : b; }
00063 inline unsigned long MIN(unsigned long a, unsigned int b) { return a < b ? a : b; }
00064 template <typename T> T CLAMP(const T& num, const T& lower_bound, const T& upper_bound) {
00065  return num < lower_bound ? lower_bound : (num > upper_bound ? upper_bound : num); }
00066 template <typename T> int CLAMP_DIRECT(T& num, const T& lower_bound, const T& upper_bound) {
00067  if(num < lower_bound) {
00068   num = lower_bound;
00069   return -1;
00070  } else if(num > upper_bound) {
00071    num = upper_bound;
00072    return 1;
00073  } else return 0;
00074 }
00075 template <typename T> void REDUCE_CONST(T& v, const T& red_const) {
00076  if(v > 0) v = MAX((T)0, v - red_const); else if(v < 0) v = MIN((T)0, v + red_const); }
00077 template <typename T> void RESET_SMALL(T& v, const T& limit) {
00078  if((v > 0 && v < limit) || (v < 0 && v > -limit)) v = 0; }
00079 
00080 template <typename T> void MOD(T& a, const T& b) { a %= b; if(a < 0) a += b; }
00081 template <typename T> void FMOD(T& a, const T& b) { a -= b * floor(a / b); if(a < 0) a += b; }

00084 template<typename _T>
00085 class SquareMatrix {
00086 public:
00087  VectorD2<_T> v1, v2;
00088  SquareMatrix(VectorD2<_T> _v1 = VectorD2<_T>(0,0), VectorD2<_T> _v2 = VectorD2<_T>(0,0)) {
00089   v1 = _v1; v2 = _v2;
00090  }
00091  
00092  static SquareMatrix Identity() {
00093   return SquareMatrix(VectorD2<_T>(1,0), VectorD2<_T>(0,1));
00094  }
00095  
00096  static SquareMatrix RotateMatrix(float angle) {
00097   SquareMatrix m;
00098   m.v1.x = cos(angle);
00099   m.v1.y = sin(angle);
00100   m.v2.x = -m.v1.y;
00101   m.v2.y = m.v1.x;
00102   return m;
00103  }
00104  
00105  CVec operator()(const VectorD2<_T>& v) const {
00106   return CVec(v.x*v1.x + v.y*v2.x, v.x*v1.y + v.y*v2.y);
00107  }
00108  SquareMatrix operator*(const SquareMatrix& m) const {
00109   return SquareMatrix((*this)(m.v1), (*this)(m.v2));
00110  }
00111  SquareMatrix operator*(const float m) const {
00112   return SquareMatrix(v1*m, v2*m);
00113  }
00114  SquareMatrix operator*(const int m) const {
00115   return SquareMatrix(v1*m, v2*m);
00116  }
00117  SquareMatrix operator/(const float m) const {
00118   return SquareMatrix(v1/m, v2/m);
00119  }
00120  SquareMatrix operator/(const int m) const {
00121   return SquareMatrix(v1/m, v2/m);
00122  }
00123  _T det() const {
00124   return v1.x*v2.y - v1.y*v2.x;
00125  }
00126  SquareMatrix inverse() const {
00127   _T tdet = det();
00128   if(tdet == 0)
00129    return SquareMatrix();
00130   else
00131    return SquareMatrix(VectorD2<_T>(v2.y,-v1.y),VectorD2<_T>(-v2.x,v1.x))/tdet;
00132  }
00133  
00134  // v1 is the upper-left, v2 the right-bottom
00135  bool isInDefinedArea(const VectorD2<_T>& p) const {
00136   return v1.x <= p.x && p.x <= v2.x && v1.y <= p.y && p.y <= v2.y;
00137  }
00138  
00139  VectorD2<_T> getCenter() const {
00140   return (v1 + v2) / 2;
00141  }
00142  
00143  SquareMatrix getInsersectionWithArea(const SquareMatrix& a) const {
00144   return SquareMatrix(
00145        VectorD2<_T>( MAX(a.v1.x, v1.x), MAX(a.v1.y, v1.y) ),
00146        VectorD2<_T>( MIN(a.v2.x, v2.x), MIN(a.v2.y, v2.y) )
00147        );
00148  }
00149  
00150 };

00153 class Parabola  {
00154 public:
00155  float a, b, c; // a*x^2 + b*x + c
00156 public:
00157  Parabola() : a(0), b(0), c(0) {}
00158  Parabola(float pa, float pb, float pc) : a(pa), b(pb), c(pc) {}
00159  Parabola(const Parabola& p) { a = p.a; b = p.b; c = p.c; }
00160  Parabola(CVec p1, CVec p2, CVec p3);
00161  Parabola(CVec p1, float angleP1, CVec p2);
00162  
00163  inline bool operator==(const Parabola& p) const {
00164   return (a == p.a && b == p.b && c == p.c);
00165  }
00166  
00167  float getLength(CVec p1, CVec p2);
00168  float getLength(float pa, float pb);
00169  bool isPointAtParabola(CVec p1)  {
00170   return (p1.y == (a * p1.x * p1.x ) + (b * p1.x) + c);
00171  }
00172 };

00175 // Random number generator with save()/restore() methods that will save and restore generator's state
00176 // This generator should produce the same numbers on any CPU architecture, if initialized with the same seed.
00177 // Ripped from Gnu Math library
00178 // I don't want to use Mersenne Twister 'cuz it has a state of 624 ints which should be copied with Save()/Restore()
00179 
00180 class SyncedRandom
00181 {
00182 public:
00183  
00184  SyncedRandom( unsigned long s = getRandomSeed() )
00185  {
00186   if (!s)
00187    s = 1UL; /* default seed is 1 */
00188   
00189     z1 = LCG (s);
00190   if (z1 < 2UL)
00191    z1 += 2UL;
00192   z2 = LCG (z1);
00193   if (z2 < 8UL)
00194    z2 += 8UL;
00195   z3 = LCG (z2);
00196   if (z3 < 16UL)
00197    z3 += 16UL;
00198   z4 = LCG (z3);
00199   if (z4 < 128UL)
00200    z4 += 128UL;
00201   
00202   /* Calling RNG ten times to satify recurrence condition */
00203   getInt(); getInt(); getInt(); getInt(); getInt();
00204   getInt(); getInt(); getInt(); getInt(); getInt();
00205  };
00206  
00207  // Returns unsigned int in a range 0 : UINT_MAX
00208  unsigned long getInt()
00209  {
00210   unsigned long b1, b2, b3, b4;
00211   
00212   b1 = ((((z1 << 6UL) & MASK) ^ z1) >> 13UL);
00213   z1 = ((((z1 & 4294967294UL) << 18UL) & MASK) ^ b1);
00214   
00215   b2 = ((((z2 << 2UL) & MASK) ^ z2) >> 27UL);
00216   z2 = ((((z2 & 4294967288UL) << 2UL) & MASK) ^ b2);
00217   
00218   b3 = ((((z3 << 13UL) & MASK) ^ z3) >> 21UL);
00219   z3 = ((((z3 & 4294967280UL) << 7UL) & MASK) ^ b3);
00220   
00221   b4 = ((((z4 << 3UL) & MASK) ^ z4) >> 12UL);
00222   z4 = ((((z4 & 4294967168UL) << 13UL) & MASK) ^ b4);
00223   
00224   return (z1 ^ z2 ^ z3 ^ z4);
00225  };
00226  
00227  // Returns float in range 0 : 1 (1 non-inclusive)
00228  float getFloat()
00229  {
00230   return getInt() / 4294967296.0f;
00231  };
00232  
00233  void save()
00234  {
00235   save_z1 = z1;
00236   save_z2 = z2;
00237   save_z3 = z3;
00238   save_z4 = z4;
00239  };
00240  
00241  void restore()
00242  {
00243   z1 = save_z1;
00244   z2 = save_z2;
00245   z3 = save_z3;
00246   z4 = save_z4;
00247  };
00248  
00249  // Returns random seed based on time() and SDL_GetTicks() functions
00250  static unsigned long getRandomSeed();
00251  
00252 private:
00253  
00254  static const unsigned long MASK = 0xffffffffUL;
00255  unsigned long LCG(unsigned long n) { return ((69069UL * n) & MASK); };
00256  
00257  unsigned long z1, z2, z3, z4;
00258  
00259  unsigned long save_z1, save_z2, save_z3, save_z4;
00260 };
